titleInfo.title: Effects of climate change and variability on agricultural production systems

physicalDescription.extent: xiv, 275 p. : ill., maps (some col.) ; 24 cm.

mods.tableOfContents: Machine generated contents note: List of Contributors -- Preface -- Acknowledgements -- 1. Assessing Global Climate Change's Impact on Agriculture -- Otto C. Doering III and J.C. Randolph -- 2. Issues and Approaches to Climate Change -- Jane Southworth -- 3. Overview of Crop Models for Assessment of Crop Production -- Joe T. Ritchie and Gopal Alagarswamy -- 4. Expert Panels' Contributions to Climate Change Research -- Rebecca A. Pfeifer and J.C. Randolph -- 5. Climate Scenario Construction for Midwest Analysis -- Jane Southworth -- 6. Validation of Corn, Soybean, and Wheat Models In DSSAT for Assessing Climate Change Impacts On Midwest Crop Production -- D. Gangadhar Rao -- 7. Crop Modeling Results under Climate Change for the Midwest USA -- Jane Southworth, Rebecca A. Pfeifer, and -- Michael Habeck -- 8. Farm-Level Economic Impacts of Climate Change -- Rebecca A. Pfeifer and Michael Habeck -- 9. Climate Variability Impacts on Farm-Level Risk -- Rebecca A. Pfeifer, Jane Southworth, -- Otto C. Doering, and Leah Moore -- 10. An Integrated Climate Change Assessment from Argentina -- Graciela O. Magrin and Maria I. Travasso -- 11. Potential Global Change Impacts on Australia's Wheat Cropping System -- S. Mark Howden -- 12. Indirect Impacts of Climate Change That Affect Agricultural Production: Soil Erosion -- Anne Williams, Fernando F. Pruski, and -- Mark Nearing -- 13. Conclusions -- Otto C. Doering III, J.C. Randolph, -- Jane Southworth, and Rebecca A. Pfeifer.
mods.note: edited by Otto C. Doering, III ... [et al.].
